sentence: My father gave me a new chess set for my birthday.
我爸爸送了我一套新的国际象棋作为生日礼物。
Always be careful to avoid a traffic accident when crossing the road.
过马路时要始终小心，避免发生交通事故。
Can you advise me on how to learn English more effectively?
你能建议我如何更有效地学习英语吗？
We have many interesting after-school activities like music and sports.
我们有很多有趣的课外活动，比如音乐和体育。
Our school football team will play against their team this Friday.
我们学校足球队这周五将和他们队比赛。
I agree with my friend that we should go to the park together.
我同意我朋友的看法，我们应该一起去公园。
The charity provided aid to the people after the big earthquake.
在那次大地震后，慈善机构为人们提供了援助。
He is very hardworking and studies English all the time.
他非常努力，一直在学习英语。
If you don't know the way, you can ask for help from the police.
如果你不知道路，你可以向警察寻求帮助。
At last, we finished our project and felt very happy.
最后，我们完成了项目，感到非常开心。
You can find some useful notes at the bottom of the page.
你可以在页面底部找到一些有用的笔记。
Please pay attention to the teacher while she is talking.
老师讲话时请注意听。
My aunt has a new baby who is very cute and small.
我阿姨有一个非常可爱且弱小的小宝宝。
Baseball is a popular game in the United States and Japan.
棒球在美联国和日本是一项受欢迎的游戏。
Our city is famous for its beautiful mountains and lakes.
我们的城市以其美丽的群山和湖泊而闻名。
I hope you will feel better after taking this medicine.
我希望你吃了这药后会感觉好一些。
The population of the world is more than seven billion now.
现在世界人口已经超过了七十亿。
I remember the date of my little sister's birth very clearly.
我非常清楚地记得我妹妹出生的日期。
Be careful! The dog might bite you if you are not careful.
小心！如果你不小心的话，那只狗可能会咬你。
I decided to book a hotel room online for our holiday.
我决定在网上为我们的假期预订一间酒店房间。
He dove deep into the pool to touch the bottom.
他跳进泳池深处去摸池底。
I have to repair my broken bicycle before I go out.
我出门前必须修理好我坏掉的自行车。
He always wears a red baseball cap to protect his face from the sun.
他总是戴着一顶红色的棒球帽来保护脸部不被太阳晒。
We went to the stadium to cheer our school team on.
我们去体育场为我们的校队加油。
Most people in China use chopsticks to eat their meals.
中国的大多数人用筷子吃饭。
Please remember to close the window when you leave the room.
离开房间时请记得关窗。
The old factory had to close down because of its high costs.
由于成本太高，那家旧工厂不得不关闭。
It's a cloudy day, so it might rain later this afternoon.
今天阴天，所以今天下午晚些时候可能会下雨。
My older brother is studying technology at a local college.
我哥哥在当地一所学院学习技术。
Come on! We are going to be late for the school meeting.
快点！我们学校开会要迟到了。
She is very confident that she can win the English speech contest.
她非常有信心她能赢得英语演讲比赛。
We had an interesting conversation about our summer vacation.
我们进行了一场关于暑假的有趣谈话。
There is a small post office on the corner of the street.
街道转角处有一家小邮局。
I like to spend my weekends in the peaceful countryside.
我喜欢在宁静的乡下度过周末。
You should use a dictionary to look up new English words.
你应该用词典来查找英语生词。
Be careful not to drop the glass on the floor.
小心别把玻璃杯掉在地上。
At the end of the term, we will have a big party.
在学期结束时，我们将举办一个大型派对。
Our class trip to the museum was a very enjoyable experience.
我们的博物馆班级旅行是一次非常愉快的体验。
I like reading books, especially those about history and science.
我喜欢读书，尤其是关于历史和科学的书。
He fell off his bike and hurt his knee yesterday afternoon.
昨天下午他从自行车上摔下来，伤到了膝盖。
She joined the fan club of her favourite pop singer.
她加入了她最喜欢的流行歌手的歌迷俱乐部。
The new library is not very far from our school.
新图书馆离我们学校不是很远。
We should live far from the noisy city during our holidays.
假期里我们应该远离喧闹的城市。
Every student should learn some basic first aid skills.
每个学生都应该学习一些基本的急救技能。
Fish and chips is a very famous traditional British food.
炸鱼加薯条是一道非常有名的英国传统食物。
Many sports, for example, football and basketball, are very popular.
许多运动，例如足球和篮球，都非常受欢迎。
I saw the ocean for the first time during my last holiday.
在上次假期中，我第一次见到了大海。
Please put the milk and eggs into the fridge to keep them fresh.
请把牛奶和鸡蛋放进冰箱以保持新鲜。
I visit my grandparents in the countryside from time to time.
我偶尔会去乡下看望我的祖父母。
Can you help me get some water from the kitchen?
你能帮我从厨房拿点水来吗？
His parents gave him a new laptop as a birthday gift.
他的父母送给他一台新笔记本电脑作为生日礼物。
The window is made of glass, so be careful not to break it.
窗户是玻璃做的，所以小心别打碎它。
Hang on a minute! I need to find my keys before we leave.
等一下！出发前我需要找到我的钥匙。
Eating too much sugar is harmful to your teeth and health.
吃太多糖对你的牙齿和健康有害。
The head teacher gave a speech at the school opening ceremony.
校长在开学典礼上发表了讲话。
Our English teacher is very helpful and always answers our questions.
我们的英语老师非常有帮助，总是回答我们的问题。
We climbed up the hill to see the beautiful sunrise.
我们爬上小山去看美丽的日出。
My home town is a small city famous for its tea production.
我的家乡是一个以产茶闻名的小城市。
I accidentally hurt my arm while I was playing football.
我踢足球时意外弄伤了胳膊。
In winter, the lake is covered with a thick layer of ice.
冬天，湖面上覆盖着一层厚厚的冰。
You should start your homework immediately after you get home.
你回家后应该立即开始写作业。
Many wild animals are in danger because of the loss of forests.
由于森林的丧失，许多野生动物正处于危险之中。
He worked hard in order to pass the difficult math exam.
他努力学习是为了通过那场很难的数学考试。
Everyone hopes that the whole world can live in peace.
每个人都希望全世界能生活在和平中。
In the end, they found the lost keys under the sofa.
最后，他们在沙发下找到了丢失的钥匙。
We arrived at the station just in time to catch the train.
我们及时赶到车站，赶上了火车。
The price of the storybook will increase from next month.
从下个月起，那本故事书的价格将会上涨。
I am very interested in history and like visiting museums.
我对历史非常感兴趣，喜欢参观博物馆。
Please keep clear of the construction area for your safety.
为了您的安全，请远离施工区域。
I received a letter from my pen friend in England yesterday.
昨天我收到了英国笔友的一封信。
Can you help me lift this heavy box up to the second floor?
你能帮我把这个重箱子搬到二楼吗？
He lifted up his hand to ask the teacher a question.
他举起手向老师提问。
Please look after my little dog when I am away on holiday.
我度假不在家时，请帮我照顾我的小狗。
We can look up information about the stars on the internet.
我们可以在互联网上查找关于星星的信息。
Don't talk loudly in the library; people are studying there.
不要在图书馆大声说话；人们在那里学习。
The temperature will be very low tonight, so keep warm.
今晚气温会很低，所以请保暖。
It is normal to make a mistake when you learn something new.
学习新事物时犯错是很正常的。
Please make sure that all the windows are closed before you leave.
请确保在离开前所有的窗户都关好了。
Our school basketball match will start at three this afternoon.
我们学校的篮球赛将在今天下午三点开始。
Did he mention anything about the class meeting during dinner?
他在晚饭时提到关于班会的事情了吗？
The nearest shop is about a mile away from our house.
最近的商店离我们家大约一英里远。
More than a million people visit the museum every year.
每年有超过一百万人参观这家博物馆。
The temperature dropped to minus five degrees last night.
昨晚气温降到了零下五度。
March is my favourite month because the flowers start to bloom.
三月是我最喜欢的月份，因为花儿开始绽放。
Can you tell me the name of that beautiful flower?
你能告诉我那朵漂亮花的名字吗？
We had a wonderful picnic in the nature park last weekend.
上周末我们在自然公园进行了一次美妙的野餐。
I have no idea how to solve this difficult math problem.
我不知道该如何解决这道难题。
Beijing is in the north of China and has four seasons.
北京位于中国北方，四季分明。
The wind is blowing from the northwest today, so it's cold.
今天风从西北方向吹来，所以很冷。
I always take notes during the English class to remember words.
我总是在英语课上记笔记以记住单词。
I have visited the Great Wall once or twice with my parents.
我和父母一起去过长城一两次。
The cat jumped onto the table to reach the milk.
猫跳到桌子上够牛奶。
He felt a sharp pain in his arm after falling down.
摔倒后，他感到胳膊一阵剧痛。
I need to buy a pair of new sports shoes for the race.
我需要买一双新的运动鞋参加比赛。
She looked a bit pale because she didn't sleep well last night.
她看起来有点苍白，因为她昨晚没睡好。
We like to walk in the park after dinner every night.
我们喜欢每天晚饭后在公园里散步。
We all hope that there will be peace in every country.
我们都希望每个国家都能和平。
The little girl's room is decorated with many pink flowers.
小女孩的房间里装饰着许多粉色的花。
It's a pity that you couldn't come to my birthday party.
非常遗憾你没能来参加我的生日派对。
The library is a quiet place for students to study.
图书馆是学生学习的安静地方。
The teacher was very pleased with our hard work this term.
老师对我们这学期的努力感到非常满意。
There is plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables in the kitchen.
厨房里有充足的新鲜水果和蔬菜。
He put his keys into his pocket and went out to play.
他把钥匙放进兜里，出去玩了。
China has a very large population of over 1.4 billion people.
中国人口众多，超过14亿。
You should practise speaking English with your classmates every day.
你应该每天和同学们练习说英语。
We need to prepare some food and drinks for the party.
我们需要为派对准备一些食物和饮料。
Her English is pretty good, and she can speak it fluently.
她的英语相当不错，能说得很流利。
It will probably rain tonight, so don't forget your umbrella.
今晚可能会下雨，所以别忘了带伞。
Can you help me pronounce this new English word correctly?
你能帮我正确读出这个英语单词的音吗？
Good pronunciation is very important for learning a foreign language.
良好的发音对学习外语非常重要。
We should protect the public environment and keep it clean.
我们应该保护公共环境并保持其清洁。
There are about fifty pupils in our class from different towns.
我们班大约有五十名来自不同城镇的小学生。
Please keep quiet in the library so that everyone can study.
请在图书馆保持安静，以便大家学习。
The little girl has a white rabbit with long ears.
那个小女孩有一只长着长耳朵的白兔。
My grandfather likes to listen to the news on the radio every morning.
我祖父喜欢每天早上听收音机里的新闻。
I stayed at home and read books on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
在一个下雨的周日下午，我待在家里看书。
Listening to music is a very relaxing way to spend your free time.
听音乐是度过闲暇时光的一种非常放松的方式。
He had to write a report about his trip to the museum.
他必须写一份关于他博物馆之行的报告。
Don't throw rubbish on the floor; put it into the bin.
不要把垃圾扔在地上；把它放进垃圾桶里。
They decided to set up a new school library for the students.
他们决定为学生们建立一个新的学校图书馆。
You should finish your homework before you go out to play.
出去玩之前你应该完成作业。
The little boy is very shy and doesn't like talking to strangers.
那个小男孩很害羞，不喜欢和陌生人说话。
The two friends walked side by side along the river.
那两个朋友并排走在河边。
The mountain is covered with white snow in the winter.
冬天，山上被白雪覆盖。
We had a snowy day last week and made a big snowman.
上周我们遇到了下雪天，堆了一个大雪人。
Schools play an important role in our modern society.
学校在我们的现代社会中起着重要的作用。
He tried his best to solve the difficult math problem.
他竭尽全力去解决那道难题。
Our city is located in the southeast part of China.
我们的城市位于中国东南部。
They decided to travel to the southwest of China next summer.
他们决定明年夏天去中国西南部旅游。
You should pay attention to the spelling of English words.
你应该注意英语单词的拼写。
Ssh! Please be quiet; the baby is sleeping in the room.
嘘！请安静；宝宝正在房间里睡觉。
Thousands of people went to the stadium to watch the match.
数千人去体育场观看了比赛。
He ran up the stairs to get his schoolbag from his room.
他跑上楼梯，从房间里拿书包。
It's a sunny day today, so let's go for a picnic in the park.
今天天气晴朗，我们去公园野餐吧。
Please don't take away my dictionary; I need it for the class.
请别拿走我的词典；我上课需要它。
The soup tastes very delicious and fresh with some vegetables.
放了些蔬菜后，这汤尝起来非常鲜美。
She invited all her friends to a small tea party last Sunday.
上周日她邀请所有的朋友来参加一个小茶话会。
In ancient China, people often met and talked in a teahouse.
在中国古代，人们经常在茶馆见面和交谈。
The temperature will rise to twenty degrees this afternoon.
今天下午气温将升至二十度。
The paper is very thin and easy to tear if not careful.
这纸很薄，如果不小心很容易撕破。
You should think about your future and work hard now.
你应该思考你的未来，现在就开始努力。
I can't think of any other way to help them at the moment.
目前我想不出任何其他办法来帮助他们。
It's time to go to bed; we have to get up early tomorrow.
该睡觉了；我们明天得早起。
The little boy likes to play with his toy cars on the floor.
那个小男孩喜欢在地板上玩他的玩具车。
Eating mooncakes is a famous tradition in the Mid-Autumn Festival.
吃月饼是中秋节的一个著名传统。
We will take the high-speed train to Beijing next Monday.
下周一我们将乘高铁去北京。
The football players need a lot of training to win the game.
足球运动员需要大量的训练才能赢得比赛。
I have visited the Great Wall twice with my family.
我和家人一起去过长城两次。
Remember to bring an umbrella because it might rain today.
记得带把伞，因为今天可能会下雨。
There is a small cat sleeping under the wooden chair.
木椅下睡着一只小猫。
As usual, he got up early and went for a run in the park.
像往常一样，他起得很早，去公园跑步了。
Our teacher showed us an interesting video about wild animals.
我们的老师给我们看了一个关于野生动物的有趣视频。
Don't spend too much time playing video games on weekends.
周末不要花太多时间玩电子游戏。
Reading more books is a good way to increase your vocabulary.
多读书是增加词汇量的好方法。
The weather is becoming warm and pleasant in the spring.
春天天气变得温暖宜人。
It is important to warm up your body before doing sports.
做运动前热身很重要。
The sun sets in the west and rises in the east every day.
太阳每天从西边落下，从东边升起。
Don't walk on the floor while it's still wet after cleaning.
地刚洗完还湿着的时候不要在上面走。
What's the matter? You look a bit pale and tired today.
怎么了？你今天看起来有点苍白和疲倦。
What's wrong with your computer? It doesn't seem to work now.
你的电脑怎么了？现在好像不能用了。
We should protect wild animals and their natural homes.
我们应该保护野生动物和它们天然的家。
Please open the window to let some fresh air into the room.
请开窗让新鲜空气进到房间里。
It's very windy today, so be careful when you walk outside.
今天风很大，所以你在外面走的时候要小心。
I wish you a happy birthday and a wonderful new year.
我祝你生日快乐，新的一年万事如意。
You should try to remember ten new English words every day.
你应该努力每天记住十个新的英语单词。
Please write down the homework on your notebook clearly.
请清晰地把作业记在你的笔记本上。
Don't be afraid to make a wrong choice occasionally.
偶尔做出错误的选择不要紧。
